text: でも私たちはエヴァの操縦を / 14歳の子供たちに委ねざるを得ないのよ / わかってる / で? / シンジ君から連絡は?
translation: But we have no choice but to entrust Eva's operation to 14-year-old children. I know. So? Have you heard from Shinji?

vocabulary.meaning: cannot help but, have no choice but to

grammar: ざるを得ない - expressing no choice or alternative (must do something despite not wanting to)

text: ないの?
translation: Nothing?
grammar: の - question particle adding emphasis or seeking confirmation

text: ないわ / 彼もう戻らないかもしれない / どうするつもり?
translation: Nothing. He might not come back. What are you going to do?
grammar: かもしれない - expressing possibility or uncertainty (might/may)

text: 別に戻らないならその方がいいかも
translation: Actually, it might be better if he doesn't come back.

vocabulary.meaning: maybe, might (shortened from かもしれない)

grammar: なら - conditional 'if'; その方が - that way/alternative (comparison)

text: ノズこの間の戦闘の後でさ
translation: You know, after that battle the other day...
grammar: さ - sentence-ending particle for casual emphasis or to get attention

text: どうして私の命令を無視したの? / ごめんなさい
translation: Why did you ignore my orders? I'm sorry.
grammar: の - explanatory/questioning particle seeking explanation

text: あなたの作戦責任者は私でしょ? / はい / あなたには私の命令に従う義務があるの / わかるわね? / はい / こういうことのないように / はい
translation: I'm your tactical commander, right? Yes. You have a duty to follow my orders. You understand, right? Yes. Make sure this doesn't happen again. Yes.

vocabulary.reading: さくせんせきにんしゃ

grammar: でしょ - confirmation particle (right?); ように - expressing purpose or instruction (so that)

text: あんた本当に分かってんでしょうね / はい
translation: You really understand, don't you? Yes.
grammar: てんでしょうね - contracted form of ているでしょうね (do/are...right?) with strong expectation

text: あんたね何でも適当にはいはい言ってりゃいいってもんじゃないわよ / 分かってますよちゃんと
translation: You know, you can't just casually say 'yes, yes' to everything and think that's good enough. I understand properly.
grammar: りゃ - contracted conditional form; ってもんじゃない - it's not as simple as just doing X

text: もういいじゃないですか勝ったんだから / そうやって表面だけ人に合わせていれば楽でしょうけどね
translation: Isn't it fine already since we won? It may be easy just superficially going along with people like that, but...

vocabulary.meaning: to match, to go along with

grammar: んだから - explanatory emphasis (since/because); ていれば - if you keep doing; でしょうけどね - softened criticism (may be...but)

text: そんな気持ちでエヴァーに乗ってたら死ぬわよ / いいですよ / そんなの
translation: If you pilot Eva with that kind of attitude, you'll die. That's fine. Something like that.
grammar: てたら - conditional continuation (if you keep doing); わよ - feminine emphatic particle

text: いい覚悟だわと言いたいとこだけど / 褒められると思ったら大間違いよ 怒りしんじくん / 褒められるものにも / どうせ僕しか 乗れないんでしょ
translation: I'd like to say that's admirable resolve, but if you think you'll be praised, you're dead wrong, Shinji. Even if it were praiseworthy... Anyway, I'm the only one who can pilot it, right?
grammar: と言いたいとこだけど - I'd like to say...but; と思ったら - if you think (with implication of being wrong)

text: 乗りますよ
translation: I'll pilot it.
grammar: ますよ - polite future/intention with emphasis

text: なるほど / ね
translation: I see. Right.
grammar: ね - seeking agreement or confirmation

text: あの子にとってエヴァに乗ることが 苦痛でしかないのならもう乗らない / 方がいいわ
translation: If piloting Eva is nothing but suffering for that child, then it's better if he doesn't pilot anymore.
grammar: でしかない - emphasis that something is only/nothing but; なら - conditional if

text: 絶対死ぬもの / でもパイロットは必要よ
translation: He'll definitely die. But we need a pilot.
grammar: もの - explanatory particle expressing reason or assertion

text: なったなったなったなったドアー / ッ!
translation: [Sound effects/battle scene dialogue]
grammar: Audio appears to be from a TV show/movie scene being watched

text: 招待所殿!
translation: Captain! [from TV show]
grammar: 殿 - formal/military honorific suffix

text: 行くんだ! / しかし自分は招待所殿を置いては進めません!
translation: Go! But I cannot proceed leaving you behind, Captain! [from TV show]
grammar: んだ - emphatic command; ては - if doing (negative implication); cannot do X if leaving you

text: バカの! / あー!
translation: You fool! Ahhh! [from TV show]
grammar: の - emphatic/emotive particle (often used in exclamations)

text: よっと。
translation: Alright then.
grammar: と - quotative/exclamatory particle

text: ん?
translation: Hm?
grammar: Interjection expressing questioning or noticing something

text: 天皇生?
translation: A transfer student?
grammar: Rising intonation for question

text: イカリー!
translation: Ikari!
grammar: Long vowel extension for calling out to someone

text: 当時の奴さ、反省してた
translation: You know, Toji was reflecting on it.
grammar: さ - casual emphasis particle; てた - casual past continuous

text: 妹に説教されたらしいよ / 私たちを救ってくれたのはあのロボットなのよって
translation: Apparently his little sister lectured him. She said 'That robot is what saved us, you know.'
grammar: らしい - hearsay/conjecture (apparently); のは...なの - explanatory emphasis (it's...that); って - quotation particle
